desc: Parasol is a record store in Urbana IL selling new/used LPs, CDs, 45s, DVDs, magazines (Mojo, Uncut, Shindig!, Ugly Things, etc) and collectibles. Home of Parasol Records, Hidden Agenda, Mud Records, Spur Records, Reaction Recordings, Action Musik, Bird Song Recordings, Velvet Crush. IttyBittyBikeShop shares our space.

layout.text: Home of Parasol Records, Hidden Agenda, Mud Records, Spur Records, Reaction Recordings, Action Musik and Bird Song Recordings. We also sell a ton of other stuff.
